name: Love Company-Demo
description:
Things have really been tough... After multiple moves, an emotionally-draining breakup, and some seriously long hours at work... it's been difficult for you to stay positive about the future...

 But it looks like things may soon change for the better. There's this special someone you've been thinking about. They came to your section just over a month ago. You can't help but wonder about the possibilities.

...  If only you could keep past mistakes from getting in the way...

This is meant to be a horror game. Some of the scenarios will contain subject material that some may find deeply upsetting or triggering, including depictions of stalking, assault, physical/mental abuse, self-harm, homicide and allusions to suicide.

I'd love to hear what you think of the story, so far.

  •  Art and story  by Shibakita 
  • Proofreading by Sean Wira

If you donate $4.00 or more, you'll also get the full-res versions of the itch.io cover image, the office building's facade  and the player's desk (with a transparent computer screen).

  • The cover image is 2520 x 2000 pixels.
  • The other two images are 5120 x 2880 pixels.
